text:
Anyone use Contentful as their CMS?

I have experience using Wordpress, Drupal, and Webflow. So I'm hoping to hear from people who have experience using Contentful — what they like or don't like — versus hearing about alternatives.

elements.text:

text: what does your content tech stack look like? would love to curate a big list of all the tools people use for writing, planning, seo, keyword research, content optimization, etc. i'll go first →

text:

• data: google analytics
• writing: bear or google docs
• seo: ahrefs
• content optimization: clearscope
• planning: airtable
• email: convertkit

text: I have! I had a very positive experience, but I did have a marketing-focused engineer as a resource. I find Contentful works best if you generally have that resource, as it’s built to be customizable to whatever your specific needs are.

elements.text: I have! I had a very positive experience, but I did have a marketing-focused engineer as a resource. I find Contentful works best if you generally have that resource, as it’s built to be customizable to whatever your specific needs are.

• SEO: Ahrefs + Semrush
• Customer Research: Gong

• Social: Agorapulse
• Optimization: Clearscope

• KB/SOPs: Guru
• Comm: Slack/Missive/Loom
That's good to hear. Thank you.
